segments.text: I hate to say goodbye , but it's late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can't you stay for a little bit longer , it's only 8 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish I could.But I'm afraid I can't . I've got some serious studying to do . I have to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: See you on Moday.Have a great weekend .
segments.speaker: S1
